name: I'm Trapped in This Tower Guarded by a Knight; How Do I Get Out?
name_original: I'm Trapped in This Tower Guarded by a Knight; How Do I Get Out?
description:
The name says it all!

I'm Trapped in This Tower Guarded by a Knight; How Do I Get Out? is an atmospheric adventure game with point and click controls and escape room mechanics with visual novel elements.

You play as a demon that has been locked away for 5000 years for crimes against humanity; is this new guard posted outside your cell door your chance to get out?

Explore the room for any means of escape, influence the guard, and shape the demon's future. Can you redeem them? Or will you help them succumb to destruction. Your first choice will decide!

(Warning: Strong Language and Flashing Lights Within)

This game was completed during Xbox Game Studios Game Camp Atlanta 2022.
